member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ColleagueFinance.GlAccountValidationResponse
member.summary: Contains the result of validating a GL account. It returns the Id, a status condition, and a set of properties depending on the status. If the status is set to failure, it returns the Error message that indicates how the validation failed. If the status is set to success, it returns the FormattedId, Description and the remaining balance that will be used for funds availability.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ColleagueFinance.VoucherStatus
member.summary: The enumeration contains all of the status values that are available for vouchers.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ColleagueFinance.VoucherStatus.NotApproved
member.summary: NotApproved status means that approvals are required for vouchers, and that the voucher does not have sufficient approval signatures to make it outstanding.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ColleagueFinance.VoucherStatus.Outstanding
member.summary: Outstanding status means that the voucher amounts have been reflected in the general ledger.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ColleagueFinance.VoucherStatus.Paid
member.summary: Paid status means that the voucher has been paid.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ColleagueFinance.VoucherStatus.Reconciled
member.summary: Reconciled status means that the cash disbursement for the voucher has been reconciled with the bank.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ColleagueFinance.VoucherStatus.InProgress
member.summary: InProgress status means that the voucher is unfinished.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ColleagueFinance.VoucherStatus.Voided
member.summary: Voided status means that the voucher has been voided.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ColleagueFinance.VoucherStatus.Cancelled
member.summary: Cancelled status means that the voucher was cancelled.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ColleagueFinance.VoucherStatus.Purged
member.summary: Purged status means the voucher was purged.
